Starter Packs

Autobot Starter Set

  1. Which card sets are permitted in Constructed tournaments?
    Wave 1: Transformers TCG Booster Packs
    • Convention Pack 2018
    • Autobot Starter Set
    • Metroplex Deck
    • Convention Edition 2018
    Wave 2: Rise of the Combiners
    • Devastator Deck
    • Bumblebee vs Megatron Starter Set
    Wave 3: War for Cybertron: Siege I
    • Convention Pack 2019
    Blaster vs Soundwave (35th Anniversary Edition)
    Blaster vs Soundwave (Retail Edition)
    Wave 4: War for Cybertron: Siege II
    Wave One Energon Edition (Character and Battle Cards)
  2. What battle cards are in the Autotbot Starter Set?
    2 x Armored Plating
    2 x Data Pad
    2 x Debilitating Crystal
    2 x Flamethrower
    2 x Grenade Launcher
    2 x Handheld Blaster
    2 x Improvised Shield
    2 x Incoming Transmission
    2 x Inspiring Leadership
    2 x Leap into Battle
    2 x New Designs
    2 x Piercing Blaster
    2 x Plasma Burst
    2 x Primary Laser
    2 x Ramming Speed
    2 x Rapid Ascent
    2 x Rapid Conversion
    2 x Ready for Action
    2 x Repair Bay
    2 x Team-Up Tactics
  3. Can the same character attack 2 turns in a row?
    As long as that character is untapped, sure. (The basic rules used with the Autobot Starter Set say that a character can’t attack twice in a row, but that rule isn’t part of the Advanced Rules.)
